item.description:
I walked into a dream last year when I attended this fantastic event - To have world renoun Opera stars singing such beautiful songs while I sipped on my favorite bottle of wine and toured the lovely estate.

Eva Franki Opened her home and her heart to over 3500 people you could not help but feel the love that Sergio and Eva shared together.

 

Come and let us lift our wine glasses and toast to Opera and Love

On September 8, 2012, we will be holding ‘our darling’ Sergio’s 19th Annual Memorial Concert.  It will be held on his Estate in Stonington Connecticut.

We hope to bring you Bigger Surprises...Greater Guests… and more fun than ever!

I hope to see you all there. Order your tickets now.  Order as soon as possible, we will be limiting the sales to 4000 attendees.

Click here for ticket purchase information.

Bring your own picnic, bring your own wine... and get ready to party.

Those of you who are already on our mailing list, you should receive the invitation by the end of June.

Yes....Mama is still with us, and God willing, she will be with us on concert day.

I look forward to seeing you all.

Love Eva  (5/20/2012)

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Sergio Franki "Opera Festival" "When Two People Fell In Love The Dream was Opera
